author: radekkapka
content:
debug endpoints are also supported in Prysm, but not by default
you can enable them with `--enable-debug-rpc-endpoints`, as described here: https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/prysm-usage/parameters

author: jgm
content: If you're thinking of https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/ then it's for the beacon node not the validator client, so doesn't have that information.
